utils.notFound: Wax xog ah lagama helin qaybtaan.

content.title: Vietopik - Ka baro Kuuriyada bilaashka ah
content.newCollection: Ururinta cusub ee la heli karo
content.oneStopPlatform: Xoogga waxbarasho ee ugu dambeysa ee Kuuriya
content.learnKorean: Ka baro Kuuriyada casharro tayo sare leh oo khubaro ah gabi ahaanba kharash la'aan.
content.learnFromExperts: Wax ka baro kuwa ku hadla dadka ku hadla iyo macallimiin khibrad leh.
content.learnAtYourOwnPace: Wax ka barto xawaarahaaga adiga oo leh marin aan xadidneyn casharro.
content.coverAllAspects: Laga bilaabo bilowga ah ee heerar sare, oo daboolaya naxwaha, ereyada, iyo wada hadalka.
content.whatOurLearnersSay: Waxa ay bartaan tahay inay bartaan

testimonial1.quote: "Vietopik wuxuu iga caawiyay inaan u diyaar garoobo imtixaankeyga Topik si wax ku ool ah. Casharradu waa mid hagaagsan oo ay fududahay in la raaco!"
testimonial1.name: Nguyen MinH anh

testimonial2.quote: "Barashada Kuuriyaanka waligeed ma fududaan! Casharada qaabeysan waxay wax walba ku sameeyaan wax kasta oo fudud oo xiiso leh."
testimonial2.name: Tran Hai nam

testimonial3.quote: "Thanks to vietopik, dhageysigeyga iyo xirfadahayga ayaa si weyn u soo wanaagsanaaday seddex bilood gudahood!"
testimonial3.name: Le egh hong

content.yourOneStopShop: Maskaxdaada hal-joogsi ah ee loogu talagalay sahaminta Kuuriyada. Ka hel kheyraadka lacagta qiyaamaha si bilaash ah oo loo gaaro luuqadahaaga luuqaddaada maanta!

metadata.lesson: Baro casharadeena ugu dambeeyay oo hel wax aad jeclaan doonto.
metadata.grammar: Jaangooyada naxwaha ee la heli karo
